name: reducer-sandbox
description: Allows to reuse your redux reducers in different place without conflict them.

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.check:commonjs: npm run build:commonjs && npm run test:commonjs
scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/reducer-sandbox.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/reducer-sandbox.min.js
scripts.build:umd:test: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=test webpack src/index.js src/__test__/*-test.js dist/reducer-sandbox.test.js
scripts.watch:coverage: nodemon $npm_package_config_test_files $npm_package_config_source_files --delay 2500ms -x 'npm run test:ci && npm run coverage'
